## ExtensionManager.isEqual() method

Checks whether two manager's are equal. Can be used to determine whether a change in props has caused anything to actually change and prevent a rerender.

ExtensionManagers are equal when - They have the same number of extensions - Same order of extensions - Each extension has the same options (ignoring methods)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isEqual(otherManager: unknown): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  otherManager | <code>unknown</code> | the value to test against |

<b>Returns:</b>

`boolean`
